name: Jared Thompson
persona: Jared is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who has faced some academic challenges, reflected in his CGPA of 2.62. He is moderately conscientious and shows average perseverance, but sometimes struggles with maintaining consistent study habits and motivation. Jared is not overly anxious about exams, which helps him stay calm under pressure. He aspires to improve his grades and is working on building stronger self-discipline to reach his academic goals.
